Representation: The Tower represents upheaval, ambition or awakening; it stands proud as a symbol of change.
Guidance: You should embrace the excitement of chaos, abandon conventions that no longer work and look for new opportunities glimmering on the horizon.

Representation: The Wheel of Fortune represents luck, destiny or unpredictability; the chaotic pattern of existence or the happy accident of good fortune.
Guidance: You should embrace the unexpected, risk trying new things and remember that you cannot control every detail.

Representation: The world represents achievement, accomplishment and travel; the promise of discovery and the satisfaction of completion.
Guidance: You should take a moment to be proud of your success, remember to take stock of things that make you happy and finish any passion projects.
